reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

description.narrative: A humanitarian program for Syrian refugees in Zaatari camp contains: A medical project in the center's clinics in the camp. An educational project for female teachers and children to develop teaching methods for female teachers and develop the child's learning skills. A project to empower women by training in some crafts and providing psychological and family courses. First aid project to train trainers and paramedics

Supporting refugee camps, obtaining tangible results during the implementation days of the program, and completing the rehabilitation and training of beneficiaries with regard to their identified needs, including a medical program, an educational, training and psychological program, and support and empowerment for women.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
